Amos__09.6__His ascension: : That is, his high throne.-- Ibid.
Amos__09.6__His bundle: : That is, his church bound up together by the bands of one faith and communion.
Amos__09.7__As the children of the Ethiopians: : That is, as black as they, by your iniquities.
Amos__09.13__Shall overtake: : By this is meant the great abundance of spiritual blessings; which, as it were, by a constant succession, shall enrich the church of Christ.
